demo

Source: vignettes/wip/demo.Rmd
demo.Rmd
options(crayon.enabled = TRUE)
fansi::set_knit_hooks(knitr::knit_hooks)
## <STYLE type='text/css' scoped>
## PRE.fansi SPAN {padding-top: .25em; padding-bottom: .25em};
## </STYLE>
## $output
## function (x, options) 
## {
##     hook.t(x, options, options[[paste0("attr.", class)]], options[[paste0("class.", 
##         class)]])
## }
## <bytecode: 0x1fcf3f8>
## <environment: 0x3a1b898>

Create new package

pkg <- usethis::create_package(tempfile("pkg"))
## ✔ Creating '/tmp/Rtmp1igUCR/pkg5fd349205f0d/'
## ✔ Setting active project to '/tmp/Rtmp1igUCR/pkg5fd349205f0d'
## ✔ Creating 'R/'
## ✔ Writing 'DESCRIPTION'
## Package: pkg5fd349205f0d
## Title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
## Version: 0.0.0.9000
## Authors@R (parsed):
##     * First Last <first.last@example.com> [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/YOUR-ORCID-ID>)
## Description: What the package does (one paragraph).
## License: What license it uses
## Encoding: UTF-8
## LazyData: true
## ✔ Writing 'NAMESPACE'
## ✔ Setting active project to '<no active project>'

pkg
## /tmp/Rtmp1igUCR/pkg5fd349205f0d

Set up development work

usethis::proj_set(pkg)
## ✔ Setting active project to '/tmp/Rtmp1igUCR/pkg5fd349205f0d'

usethis::proj_get()
## /tmp/Rtmp1igUCR/pkg5fd349205f0d

usethis::use_git()
## ✔ Initialising Git repo
## ✔ Adding '.Rhistory', '.RData', '.Rproj.user' to '.gitignore'

repo <- git2r::repository(pkg)
git2r::config(repo = repo, user.name = "Test", user.email = "test@user.org")

FIXME: This shouldn’t be necessary

usethis::use_news_md()
## ✔ Writing 'NEWS.md'

git2r::add(repo = repo, path = ".")
git2r::commit(repo = repo, message = "Initial NEWS.md .")
## [61701b2] 2019-11-27: Initial NEWS.md .

Hacking in the package

usethis::use_r("test")
## ● Edit 'R/test.R'

Committing with a meaningful message

git2r::add(repo = repo, path = ".")
git2r::commit(repo = repo, message = "- Mew file test.R .")
## [b27045f] 2019-11-27: - Mew file test.R .

Bumping the package version

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
fledge::bump_version()
## ℹ Scraping 2 commit messages
## ✔ Found 1 NEWS-worthy entries.
## ℹ Adding new entries to 'NEWS.md'

## Package version bumped from '0.0.0.9000' to '0.0.0.9001'
## ✔ Package version bumped to 0.0.0.9001
## ℹ Adding header to 'NEWS.md'
## ℹ Committing changes
## ℹ Creating tag 'v0.0.0.9001' with tag message derived from 'NEWS.md'
## ● Edit 'NEWS.md'
## ● If you have updated 'NEWS.md', save the file and call `fledge::finalize_version()`
## ● When done, push your changes to the remote repository. Make sure to push the tags too, use `git push --tags` from the command line.

Review NEWS.md

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
news <- readLines("NEWS.md")
cat(news, sep = "\n")
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9001
## 
## - Mew file test.R .
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9000
## 
## * Added a `NEWS.md` file to track changes to the package.

A mistake? No problem:

news <- gsub("Mew", "New", news)
cat(news, sep = "\n")
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9001
## 
## - New file test.R .
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9000
## 
## * Added a `NEWS.md` file to track changes to the package.

Edit NEWS.md and finalize

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
writeLines(news, "NEWS.md")
fledge::finalize_version()
## ℹ Resetting to previous commit
## ℹ Committing changes
## ℹ Deleting tag 'v0.0.0.9001'
## ℹ Creating tag 'v0.0.0.9001' with tag message derived from 'NEWS.md'
## ● If you edit 'NEWS.md' again, save the file and call `fledge::finalize_version()`

Hacking more

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
writeLines("# frobnicate", "R/test.R")

Committing with a meaningful message

git2r::add(repo = repo, path = ".")
git2r::commit(repo = repo, message = "- Add support for frobnication.")
## [fee0dae] 2019-11-27: - Add support for frobnication.

Hacking more

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
writeLines("# super-frob", "R/test.R")

Committing with a meaningful message

git2r::add(repo = repo, path = ".")
git2r::commit(repo = repo, message = "- Super-frobnication enabled.")
## [3416aa1] 2019-11-27: - Super-frobnication enabled.

Bumping the package version

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
fledge::bump_version()
## ℹ Scraping 2 commit messages
## ✔ Found 2 NEWS-worthy entries.
## ℹ Adding new entries to 'NEWS.md'

## Package version bumped from '0.0.0.9001' to '0.0.0.9002'
## ✔ Package version bumped to 0.0.0.9002
## ℹ Adding header to 'NEWS.md'
## ℹ Committing changes
## ℹ Creating tag 'v0.0.0.9002' with tag message derived from 'NEWS.md'
## ● Edit 'NEWS.md'
## ● If you have updated 'NEWS.md', save the file and call `fledge::finalize_version()`
## ● When done, push your changes to the remote repository. Make sure to push the tags too, use `git push --tags` from the command line.

Some time has passed…

Preparing for first release

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
fledge::bump_version("patch")
## ℹ Scraping 1 commit messages
## ✔ Found 1 NEWS-worthy entries.
## ℹ Adding new entries to 'NEWS.md'

## Package version bumped from '0.0.0.9002' to '0.0.1'
## ✔ Package version bumped to 0.0.1
## ℹ Adding header to 'NEWS.md'
## ℹ Committing changes
## ℹ Preparing package for release (CRAN or otherwise)
## ● Edit 'NEWS.md'
## ● Every time you edit 'NEWS.md', save it and call `fledge::commit_version()`
## ● After CRAN release, call `fledge::tag_version(force = TRUE)` and `fledge::bump_version()` to re-enter development mode

Consolidating NEWS.md

Current contents

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
news <- readLines("NEWS.md")
cat(news, sep = "\n")
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.1
## 
## - Same as previous version.
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9002
## 
## - Super-frobnication enabled.
## - Add support for frobnication.
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9001
## 
## - New file test.R .
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.0.9000
## 
## * Added a `NEWS.md` file to track changes to the package.

Consolidate messages

length(news) <- 5
news[3:5] <- c(
  "Initial release.",
  "",
  "Basic functionality: Super-frobnication."
)

Review

cat(news, sep = "\n")
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.1
## 
## Initial release.
## 
## Basic functionality: Super-frobnication.

Update NEWS.md

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
writeLines(news, "NEWS.md")

Release to CRAN…

Package accepted!

Finalize version

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
fledge::tag_version()
## ℹ Creating tag 'v0.0.1' with tag message derived from 'NEWS.md'

Consider calling usethis::use_github_release()

Immediately bump version to next devel version

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
fledge::bump_version()
## ℹ Scraping 1 commit messages
## ✔ Found 1 NEWS-worthy entries.
## ℹ Adding new entries to 'NEWS.md'

## Package version bumped from '0.0.1' to '0.0.1.9000'
## ✔ Package version bumped to 0.0.1.9000
## ℹ Adding header to 'NEWS.md'
## ℹ Committing changes
## ℹ Creating tag 'v0.0.1.9000' with tag message derived from 'NEWS.md'
## ● Edit 'NEWS.md'
## ● If you have updated 'NEWS.md', save the file and call `fledge::finalize_version()`
## ● When done, push your changes to the remote repository. Make sure to push the tags too, use `git push --tags` from the command line.

Review NEWS.md

setwd(pkg) # FIXME: This shouldn't be necessary
news <- readLines("NEWS.md")
cat(news, sep = "\n")
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.1.9000
## 
## - Same as previous version.
## 
## 
## # pkg5fd349205f0d 0.0.1
## 
## Initial release.
## 
## Basic functionality: Super-frobnication.
